DOC.brief_summary: The research question : 1 . What proportion woman undergo hysterectomy hysteroscopic sterilization laparoscopic tubal ligation ? 2 . What proportion woman undergo salpingectomy , salpingostomy , hysteroscopy hysteroscopic sterilization laparoscopic tubal ligation ? 3 . What proportion woman diagnosis pelvic pain hysteroscopic sterilization laparoscopic tubal ligation ?
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Claims Analysis Hysterectomy After Sterilization
DOC.criteria: Women age 18 49 year index date least one claim hysteroscopic sterilization procedure interval laparoscopic tubal ligation time January 1 , 2010 December 31 , 2012 Had 6 month continuous medical pharmacy benefit preindex date consider baseline period capture patient characteristic prior procedure Had 12 month continuous medical pharmacy benefit postindex date ( i.e. , followup period ) Women underwent postpartum tubal ligation procedure entire study period Women claim sterilization procedure baseline period Women claim pregnancy delivery within 6 week prior index date Women one type sterilization procedure ( i.e. , combination hysteroscopic sterilization , laparoscopic tubal ligation minilaparotomy ) index date Women concurrent procedure day index sterilization procedure perform reason beyond purpose sterilization
